data.actual_result: It looks very awkward, and feels stiff. This started to occur as soon as I updated to 7.9.0.
data.short_description: Expanding a log is very un-smooth on Audit Logs.
data.steps_to_repro: - Update to 7.9.0 - Go to Audit Logs - Expand and close a log that can be expanded. Do this multiple times.
